Using co function identities find the value of theta

\begin{array}{l}\n\csc \theta=\frac{\sqrt{13}}{2}, \sec \theta=\frac{\sqrt{13}}{3} \\\n\sec \theta= \\\n\sin \theta= \\\n\tan \theta=\n\end{array}[imath]\csc \theta=\frac{\sqrt{13}}{2}, \sec \theta=\frac{\sqrt{13}}{3} [/imath] [imath]\sec \theta= [/imath] [imath]\sin \theta= [/imath] [imath]\tan \theta=[/imath]
